Activity: Check emails and review any updates from the EHR vendor.
Prepare a weekly progress report summarizing achievements, challenges, and next steps.
Present the weekly progress report in a team meeting with @itpm-1, @clinlead-1, and @ehrv-1.
Discuss any roadblocks and brainstorm solutions with the team.
Follow up on action items from the team meeting and assign tasks as needed.
Coordinate with @helpdesk-1 to ensure support readiness for any upcoming EHR changes.
Wrap up the week by organizing notes and setting priorities for the next week.
Browse social media and relax before the weekend.
